reviews.review: A fantastic expansion of the world of Portal. It's like Empire to Portal 1's Star Wars.

evrything except wheatly
amazing game, its my new favorite and I recommend it to anyone that can get it. 10/10
Legal, Ã³timo jogo de enigmas, apesar dos paradoxos...
epic story epic puzzles

This Game Is Amazing!
it is just great throughout the characters and the story the world and the atmosphere it's all just great,

First the plot,
it's amazing it's hard to find a puzzle game that has such a great story, (spoilers ahead)
you are stranded in a lab that has been closed for a long time (either 9-9(55) years so quite a while)
and your good friend wheatly has come to save you while your old (pal) GLADoS has come back
 you go through puzzles to get to her,
once you get there wheatly go's mad with power glados is a potato you continue on your way,

Game-play,
the gameplay is great with ink, lazer, the portal device and more there is a lot of stuff... at first,
you see after completing the game I realized that there was a level editor and found that there is actually very little stuff,
the game makers did a great job of making this game feel huge when really the puzzles are quite limited,

so in conclusion there is a great deal of charm and fun to be here to be played
so if you are just getting into computers and do not know quite what to do or what to buy
I am saying get this game,
it has been a blast.







still waiting for portal 3 though.

Buy this game. [after beating the original portal]

The original is a classic, no doubt, but this is WAY better. it's twice (if not thrice) as long, the graphics are better, the voice acting is more refined, there's tons of new gimmicks (Propulsion Gel, Aerial Faith Plates, and Discouragement Redirection Cubes, to name a few) that fit right in, and the story... THE STORY!!! 

And the single player's only half the game this time, now there's also a whole other Co-op campaign too! (Which i haven't gotten to play yet!) AND there's the user generated content, providing even MORE test chambers once you finish both campaigns! this game is easily worth AT LEAST $15, so $10 is a steal.

You should beat the original first, so you're caught up with the story and get a feel for portals, so buy the bundle.

C'mon. It's Portal 2. It is one of my all time favourites, because I just love everything about this game. 
The Story is funny and interesting.
The Characters are all really good (love u GLaDOS ;)
The Gameplay is actually pretty easy but for the levels you will need to use some of your brain-cells at times xD

If you haven't played Portal 1/2 you are definitely missing out on these games.

There isn't much to say about Portal 2, it's a phenomenal puzzle game bursting with charm. The characters are lovable the story is memorable, the puzzles are engaging and it has an amazing soundtrack to boot.

Can't recommend this game enough, it's one of my all time favourites.
Buy it now, it is worth it.
